title: Chromas
body: So as described by the little "featured" rotating screen in the store, all chromas are available for blue essence until the 27th of november to celebrate the changes the preseason has brought. yet when i went into the chromas tab, i found that many chromas are still locked behind a rp paywall, not sure if it was a bug, but i feel very betrayed at the moment as i was looking forward to spicing up my dragonblade talon. pleas don't advertise things falsely riot, it hurts deeply

replies.body: The chroma sale is exactly the same as those inn the past. Only those chromas that have been available for at least 6 months (or is it a year?) go on the IP (now BE) sale. Any chromas younger than that will still cost RP. You'll have to wait until the next chroma sale to pick up the Talon one for BE.
